item.name: Z_ZIPPO modifier: ** require ** Z_ZIPPO activated
item.appendix: 【 OO => Inster new line below current line 】
【 SHIFT + OO => Inster new line before current line 】
【 KK / SHIFT + JJ => Move current line up 】
【 JJ / SHIFT + KK => Move current line down 】
